ALL students/parents must complete the Medical History portion of the Pre-Participation Physical Exam Form return it to the Athletic Trainer. If any of Questions 1-6 are answered "YES," then the student will need a new physical from their Family Doctor or Primary Care Physician. Forms will be compared to the previous year to maintain accuracy. The Updated UIL Form must be used for the Physical Exam.
Make sure to take it to your Doctor’s Office.

January 27, 1955-May 20, 2020

On behalf of the Cotulla ISD Board of Trustees, Administration, Staff and Students, we would like to offer our condolences to the family of Daniel “Danny” M. Cruz Jr..
“Danny”, as known by many, began his employment with
the Cotulla ISD Maintenance Department on January 1, 2006.

For the past 14 years, Danny has worked hard to make sure our schools were well maintained, clean and safe for the students and employees of Cotulla ISD.

Mr. Cruz performed many tasks from repairing broken windows, doors and repairing classroom floors and ceilings to setting up for our school functions such as Football Games and Graduation Ceremonies.

Mr. Cruz was a kind, hard-working employee and would perform his job proudly, with a smile on his face and oftentimes with a whistle. He will be missed by all.

Our thoughts and prayers are with his family during this difficult time.

On February 28th and 29th, the Region 11 Mariachi Clinic & Concert was held at Southwest Legacy High School in San Antonio.

Students attended an intense 2-day clinic and worked with mariachi educators to develop a performance repertoire that ended the event with an evening concert.

Cotulla High School and Newman Middle school were 2 of 20 schools in attendance, ranging from 3A to 6A, with 3 representatives from Cotulla ISD.

The concert was a great success; showcasing the growth of all the students in the Region 11, as well as a reflection of the great work done by the clinicians Alma Garcia, Greg Cavazos, Dr. Oswaldo Zapata, Region 11 Mariachi Coordinator Jorge Vargas, and site host Southwest Legacy High School.

Congratulations to:
Marko Cantu - Middle School Group, Vihuela 2
Mark Linares - High School Group 2, Guitar 2
Jadrian Rodriguez - High School Group 2, Violin 4

Pictured left to right is Jadrian Rodriguez, Marko Canto, and Mark Linares
